name: Marcus Silverstring
title: Entertainment Coordinator
description: A refined half-elf with an ear for music and an eye for talent. He manages the entertainment at the Golden Griffin with professionalism and taste.

greeting.first_time: Good evening. I'm Marcus, entertainment coordinator for the Golden Griffin. Are you here to perform?
greeting.returning: Ah, you're back! Ready for another performance?
greeting.already_performed: You've already performed today. Our patrons appreciate variety—return tomorrow for another booking.

ask_about_performing.text: We book talented performers every evening. You play once per day, and we pay based on your instrument and how well you engage the crowd. Your natural charisma makes a big difference in tips!

ask_about_rates.text:
Our rates depend on the instrument. Here's what we currently accept:

Lute: 15 gold base
Flute: 12 gold base
Lyre: 14 gold base
Viol: 16 gold base
Horn: 10 gold base
Drum: 8 gold base

We don't book bagpipes, pan flutes, or shawms—not the right atmosphere. Your charisma adds a bonus: +2 gold per point above 10.

book_performance.text: Excellent! What instrument will you be playing?
book_performance.failure_no_instrument: You'll need an instrument first. Come back when you have one.
book_performance.failure_already_performed: You've already performed today. Return tomorrow!

goodbye.text: Safe travels. May your music bring you fortune.

bagpipe.reason: Too loud and raucous for our establishment

charisma_bonus.description: Each point of CHA above 10 adds 2 gold
